Package messagingsystem

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    The class maintains a simple record about a user's account information such as name, username and password We have made use of array list for keeping a record of multiple number of users.
    MessagingSystem
    The class below displays the menu for the user asking the user for the options like sign up if the user is new and wishes to create a new account, sign in if the user is already existing but wishes to check the details of the messages or the exit option.
    ReplyMsg
    The class below will only get executed only if the user is already existing into the records and the validationForLogin turns out to be true.
    SignUpSignIn
    The class below is used to carry out signUp and signIn operations respectively.
